In the [[fictional universe]] of the [[science fiction]] [[television series]] ''[[Stargate Atlantis]]'', the '''Genii''' are a human culture living in the [[Pegasus Galaxy (Stargate)|Pegasus galaxy]] (''see also: [[Human civilizations in Stargate Atlantis]]''). Although they appear to be simple [[Amish]]-like farmers, the Genii are an advanced, [[militaristic]] society. In the series, they have been both enemies and allies to the Atlantis Expedition. Nevertheless, [[Teyla Emmagan]] believes that outside of Atlantis, they represent the galaxy's best hope of defeating the Wraith.<ref name="The Return">{{sgcite|The Return|Atlantis|show=ref}}</ref>
In the [[fictional universe]] of the [[science fiction]] [[television series]] ''[[Stargate Atlantis]]'', the '''Genii''' are a human culture living in the [[Pegasus Galaxy (Stargate)|Pegasus galaxy]] (''see also: [[Human civilizations in Stargate Atlantis]]''). Although they appear to be simple [[Amish]]-like farmers, the Genii are an advanced, [[militaristic]] society. In the series, they have been both enemies and allies to the Atlantis Expedition. Nevertheless, [[Teyla Emmagan]] believes that outside of Atlantis, they represent the galaxy's best hope of defeating the Wraith.<ref name="The Return">{{sgcite|The Return|Atlantis|show=ref}}</ref>
